name: David Ramirez
text: It doesn't actually cure your cold, and the science is meager. The benefit is symptom relief, a combination of staying hydrated helping with the mucus, and compensating for the appetite suppressing effects of being sick (eating less makes it easier to drink less and get dehydrated).

source_obj.text: It doesn't actually cure your cold, and the science is meager.
